select t.id, t.orderid, t.slevel, t.evalevel, t.content, di.id did, di.drivername dname, di.phone dphone, ti.username cname, ti.phone cphone, ti.saddress, ti.eaddress, to_char(t.createtime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') createtime from TO_CUSTOMER_EVALUATION t, TO_TRANSACTION_INFO ti, TO_CAR_DRIVER_INFO di where t.orderid = ti.orderid(+) and ti.drivercode = di.drivercode(+)
t.createtime >= to_date(#stime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
t.createtime <= to_date(#etime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
t.orderid in (select orderid from TO_TRANSACTION_INFO where drivercode in (select drivercode from TO_CAR_DRIVER_INFO where drivername like '%'||#dname#||'%' ) )
ti.username like '%'||#cname#||'%'
t.slevel = #slevel#
order by t.createtime desc

select count(t.id) from TO_CUSTOMER_EVALUATION t, TO_TRANSACTION_INFO ti, TO_CUSTOMER_INFO ci, TO_CAR_DRIVER_INFO di where t.orderid = ti.orderid(+) and ti.cid = ci.id(+) and ti.drivercode = di.drivercode(+)
t.createtime >= to_date(#stime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
t.createtime <= to_date(#etime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
t.orderid in (select orderid from TO_TRANSACTION_INFO where drivercode in (select drivercode from TO_CAR_DRIVER_INFO where drivername like '%'||#dname#||'%' ) )
ti.username like '%'||#cname#||'%'
t.slevel = #slevel#
